pkgmetadata.longdescription: aino-utkik==========aino-utkik provides minimalistic class based views for Django focusing oncommon usage, readability and convienience.For Django 1.3 or earlier use 0.7.8For Django 1.7 or later use 0.8.0 or laterExample:: # urls.py from utkik.dispatch import * urlpatterns = patterns('', (r'^(?P<slug>[-\w]+)/$', 'news.NewsDetailView'), (r'^$', 'news.NewsListView'), ) # news/views.py from django.shortcuts import get_object_or_404 from news.models import News from utkik import View class NewsDetailView(View): template_name = 'news/news_detail.html' def get(self, slug): self.c.news = get_object_or_404(News.objects, slug=slug) class NewsListView(View): template_name = 'news/news_list.html' def get(self): self.c.news_list = News.objects.all()
